topic.title: Footnotes

fn.p: IFRS 9 Financial Instruments replaced IAS 39. IFRS 9 applies to all items that were previously within the scope of IAS 39.
In May 2011 the Board issued IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement, which contains requirements for measuring fair value.
IFRS 9 Financial Instruments eliminated the category of available-for-sale financial assets.
IFRS 9 Financial Instruments replaced IAS 39. IFRS 9 applies to all items that were previously within the scope of IAS 39.
In May 2011 the Board issued IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement, which contains requirements for measuring fair value.
In May 2011 the Board issued IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement, which contains requirements for measuring fair value.
In May 2011 the Board issued IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement, which contains requirements for measuring fair value.
IFRS 9 Financial Instruments replaced IAS 39. IFRS 9 applies to all items that previously were within the scope of IAS 39.
